# Description Component

### Description

**Exports:**
- `Description` - Description text component

**Usage:**
```svelte
<script lang="ts">
	import { Description } from 'kampsy-ui';
</script>

<Description
	content="Data about this section."
	title="Section Title"
	tooltip="Additional context about what this section refers to."
/>
```

## Installation

```bash
pnpm i -D kampsy-ui@latest
```

## Documentation

Visit http://ui.kampsy.xyz/description for full documentation and examples.
